pages.text: Dimensional progression is handled differently in Vesper.$(br2)There are four dimensions: the $(2)Overworld$(), the $(4)Nether$(), the $(3)Twilight Forest$(), and the $(1)End$(). $(br2)The dimensions will be accessed in this order.

pages.title: The Nether
pages.text: Three powerful spirits guard access to the nether.$(br2)You must summon and kill the $(3)Bellringer$(), $(4)Dame Fortuna$(), and $(2)Rosalyne$() to force the gate open.

pages.title: The Twilight Forest
pages.text: Before the Twilight Forest is accessed, $(8)Ignis$(), the $(6)Netherite Monstrosity$(), and the $(5)Wither$() must be slain.$(br2) With these creatures killed and a Hellish Gem created out of their key items, a 2x2 infinite water source surounded by mushrooms or flowers must have the gem thrown into it.

pages.title: The End
pages.text: To reach the End, you must progress along the Twilight forest normally, killing the boss of each area.$(br2)Only when you have killed the $(4)Hydra$() and mixed its fiery blood with ender pearls can you make the eyes of ender needed to reach the End.
